blocks.content:
In addition to my current role in travel, I am currently working on these projects. ### Power Stack I am currently working on Power Stack, a boilerplate to get started with Gatsby and Drupal 8. You can have a look at the Github repo here: [https://github.com/whiteskyweb/Power-Stack](https://github.com/whiteskyweb/Power-Stack "https://github.com/whiteskyweb/Power-Stack") ### Page builder for Drupal 8 A part of that work has involved creating a page builder for Drupal 8 which allows for much more user-friendly editing experience in Drupal 8.
### Seaside Admin theme for Drupal 8 Beautify your site with Seaside Admin. I created the Seaside Admin theme for Drupal 8 to improve the UX and expirenece of using Drupal 8. Check it out for yourself at [https://www.drupal.org/project/seaside_admin](https://www.drupal.org/project/seaside_admin "https://www.drupal.org/project/seaside_admin") or simply run: composer require 'drupal/seaside_admin:^1.9'
